response.name: bs-invoice-v1-dev
response.body:
{
    "name": "business",
    "profiles": [
        "invoice-v1-dev"
    ],
    "label": null,
    "version": "9a9b683ab98acaabb16b32cac36a6cc52a714401",
    "state": null,
    "propertySources": [
        {
            "name": "https://github.com/miguel-armas-abt/microservices-monorepo.git/file:C:\\Users\\Miguel\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\config-repo-11805065480806165590\\business-invoice-v1-dev.yaml",
            "source": {
                "application.http-client.menu-option-v2.base-url": "${BUSINESS_MENU_OPTION_BASE_PATH:http://localhost:8016/poc/business/v2/}",
                "application.http-client.dining-room-order-v1.base-url": "${BUSINESS_DINING_ROOM_ORDER_BASE_PATH:http://localhost:8010/poc/business/v1/}",
                "kafka-broker.topic.invoice": "invoice-topic",
                "kafka-broker.topic.payment": "paid-topic",
                "spring.kafka.bootstrap-servers": "localhost:9092",
                "spring.kafka.consumer.group-id": "poc",
                "spring.jpa.show-sql": true,
                "spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto": "create-drop",
                "spring.jpa.database-platform": "org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect",
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.show_sql": true,
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.use_sql_comments": false,
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql": true,
                "spring.datasource.url": "${POSTGRESQL_URL:jdbc:postgresql://127.0.0.1:5432/db_invoices?useUnicode=true&useJDBCCompliantTimezoneShift=true&useLegacyDatetimeCode=false&serverTimezone=UTC}",
                "spring.datasource.driverClassName": "org.postgresql.Driver",
                "spring.datasource.username": "${POSTGRESQL_USERNAME:poc_user}",
                "spring.datasource.password": "${POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD:qwerty}",
                "business.invoice.igv": 0.18
            }
        }
    ]
}

response.name: bs-payment-v1-dev
response.body:
{
    "name": "business",
    "profiles": [
        "payment-v1-dev"
    ],
    "label": null,
    "version": "9a9b683ab98acaabb16b32cac36a6cc52a714401",
    "state": null,
    "propertySources": [
        {
            "name": "https://github.com/miguel-armas-abt/demo-microservices-poc.git/file:C:\\Users\\Miguel\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\config-repo-11805065480806165590\\business-payment-v1-dev.yaml",
            "source": {
                "kafka-broker.topic.invoice": "invoice-topic",
                "kafka-broker.topic.payment": "paid-topic",
                "spring.kafka.bootstrap-servers": "localhost:9092",
                "spring.kafka.consumer.group-id": "poc",
                "spring.jpa.show-sql": true,
                "spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto": "create-drop",
                "spring.jpa.database-platform": "org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL8Dialect",
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.show_sql": true,
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.use_sql_comments": false,
                "spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql": true,
                "spring.datasource.url": "${MYSQL_URL:jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/db_payments?useUnicode=true&useJDBCCompliantTimezoneShift=true&useLegacyDatetimeCode=false&serverTimezone=UTC}",
                "spring.datasource.driverClassName": "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver",
                "spring.datasource.username": "${MYSQL_USERNAME:poc_user}",
                "spring.datasource.password": "${MYSQL_PASSWORD:qwerty}"
            }
        }
    ]
}
